1.name: Stand by Me
1.description: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a boyhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

2.name: Top Gun
2.description: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

3.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
3.description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

4.name: Blue Velvet
4.description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

5.name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
5.description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

6.name: Aliens
6.description: Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team after being in hypersleep for 57 years. The moon that the Nostromo visited has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

7.name: Platoon
7.description: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

8.name: Pretty in Pink
8.description: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

9.name: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
9.description: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

10.name: Peggy Sue Got Married
10.description: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

11.name: Highlander
11.description: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

12.name: Labyrinth
12.description: Sixteen-year-old Sarah (Jennifer Connelly) is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby (Toby Froud) when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth (David Bowie).

13.name: Big Trouble in Little China
13.description: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

14.name: Manhunter
14.description: Former F.B.I. profiler Will Graham (William Petersen) returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer named "the Tooth Fairy" (Tom Noonan) by the media.

15.name: Lucas
15.description: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

16.name: Little Shop of Horrors
16.description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

17.name: Nine 1/2 Weeks
17.description: A woman becomes involved with a man she barely knows. Complications develop during their sexual escapades.

18.name: The Fly
18.description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

19.name: Flight of the Navigator
19.description: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

20.name: SpaceCamp
20.description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

21.name: Der Name der Rose
21.description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

22.name: 'Crocodile' Dundee
22.description: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

23.name: Short Circuit
23.description: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

24.name: The Money Pit
24.description: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

25.name: The Color of Money
25.description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

26.name: Tough Guys
26.description: Two elderly gangsters are released from prison only to find they have trouble fitting in as old men who still take no guff from anyone.

27.name: The Mission
27.description: Eighteenth century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

28.name: From Beyond
28.description: A group of scientists have developed the Resonator, a machine which allows whoever is within range to see beyond normal perceptible reality. But when the experiment succeeds, they are immediately attacked by terrible life forms.

29.name: Howard the Duck
29.description: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop a hellish alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a cute struggling female rock singer who fancies him.

30.name: The Karate Kid Part II
30.description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

31.name: Hannah and Her Sisters
31.description: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

32.name: Cobra
32.description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

33.name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
33.description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

34.name: The Mosquito Coast
34.description: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

35.name: The Wraith
35.description: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge.

36.name: ¡Three Amigos!
36.description: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

37.name: Youngblood
37.description: A 17 year old farm boy is offered an ice hockey tryout. His brother drives him to Canada. He has fast legs, slow fists, but is chosen. Will he learn to use his fists and play ice hockey the Canuck way? Will he get the coach's cute daughter?

38.name: Sid and Nancy
38.description: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

39.name: 37°2 le matin
39.description: A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.

40.name: One Crazy Summer
40.description: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

41.name: No Retreat, No Surrender
41.description: Jason, a Bruce Lee fan, sees his karate instructor/dad beaten by martial art thugs. They move to Seattle where, after humiliations, he trains with Bruce Lee's ghost so he can defend himself and others against thugs.

42.name: Hoosiers
42.description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

43.name: Heartburn
43.description: A food writer pregnant with her second baby finds out her husband is having an affair.

44.name: Maximum Overdrive
44.description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

45.name: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
45.description: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body once and for all, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer once again seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can defeat him.

46.name: Critters
46.description: A group of small, furry aliens makes lunch out of the locals in a farming town.

47.name: The Hitcher
47.description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

48.name: Raw Deal
48.description: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

49.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
49.description: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

50.name: Back to School
50.description: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.
